name: PaymentCardTransactionRequest
desc: A request for a contactless purchase or refund that includes the purchase amount and currency information.

items.name: init(amount: Decimal, currencyCode: String, for: PaymentCardTransactionRequest.TransactionType)
items.desc: Creates a new transaction request for the specified amount in the designated currency.

items.name: let amount: Decimal
items.desc: The amount of the purchase or refund, in the requested currency.

items.name: let currencyCode: String
items.desc: The ISO 4217 code that indicates the currency type.

items.name: let type: PaymentCardTransactionRequest.TransactionType
items.desc: The type of transaction, which is either a purchase or a refund.

items.name: enum TransactionType
items.desc: The type of transaction to perform.
